Bag O' Links - 10/4/2009 Elad Meidar

10 Apr 2009

  • Icon search engines – for those of us who lake visual creativity.
  • Design Tips for Shopping carts – might come handy soon.
  • Simple LI, Great things – some nice things to do with the List Item HTML tag, you can also checkout Listamatic which totally covers the usage of LI tags.
  • Ruby comes to Google App engine – Ole is awesome.
  • Excel Views in Rails – plugin to enable XLS (Excel) views.
  • Cloud Computing Gems- EC2, S3, Slicehost… neat.
  • Web browser only Linux – xPUD is an unique Linux distribution, consisting mainly of a web browser and a media player, with a simple user interface on top.
